channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA GeForce Experience Software
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- NVIDIA GeForce Experience Software

item.title: CVE-2020-5978|2024-08-04T08:47:41.075Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20geforce%20experience%20software
item.description: NVIDIA GeForce Experience, all versions prior to 3.20.5.70, contains a vulnerability in its services in which a folder is created by nvcontainer.exe under normal user login with LOCAL_SYSTEM privileges which may lead to a denial of service or escalation of privileges.

item.title: CVE-2020-5990|2024-08-04T08:47:40.876Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20geforce%20experience%20software
item.description: NVIDIA GeForce Experience, all versions prior to 3.20.5.70, contains a vulnerability in the ShadowPlay component which may lead to local privilege escalation, code execution, denial of service or information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2020-5977|2024-08-04T08:47:40.918Z -- nvidia -- nvidia%20geforce%20experience%20software
item.description: NVIDIA GeForce Experience, all versions prior to 3.20.5.70, contains a vulnerability in NVIDIA Web Helper NodeJS Web Server in which an uncontrolled search path is used to load a node module, which may lead to code execution, denial of service, escalation of privileges, and information disclosure.
